description:
Luffy, Ace, and Sabo take pirate lessons from a mysterious old scallywag who just might know the secret to defeating the big tiger - and becoming a good captian!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A l`attaque du tigre géant ! Qui sera le capitaine ?
Ootora to no Kessen! Senchou ni Naru no wa Dare Da!
The Battle Against the Big Tiger! Who Is Going to Be Captain?!
Сражение с Гигантским тигром! Кто станет капитаном?
سُلبت الحرّيّة! فخّ النّبلاء يهدّد الإخوة!
大虎との決戦! 船長になるのは誰だ!
